abstract: Homeland Security Dept officials says A T Smith, deputy director of Secret Service, will take job within department after being demoted; Smith was singled out for criticism by Rep Jason Chaffetz, chairman of House Oversight and Government Reform Committee, for his role in series of mishaps and scandals at agency.
lead_paragraph: The deputy director, A. T. Smith, has been severely criticized by Representative Jason Chaffetz after a series of scandals at the agency.

headline.main: Secret Service Deputy Demoted as Panel Chairman Presses for Firing
headline.print_headline: Secret Service Deputy Demoted as Panel Chairman Presses for Firing

snippet: The deputy director, A. T. Smith, has been severely criticized by Representative Jason Chaffetz after a series of scandals at the agency.
